textBox.richText: Was showing friends my stopwatch app at a party last night, and one guy thought it was a countdown timer for the “rapture” yesterday. Cute. Fortunately no one at that particular party flew up into the air, so we all had a good time. A *very* good time! So I’m gonna make a count-down timer app. Why not? The stopwatch worked rather nicely, and this is essentially just going in reverse. It’s all about the user interface now. So as soon as I get the stopwatch on the marketplace, look out for the countdown timer. Oh yeah, if any of you have UI ideas or a nice drawing for an icon, give me a buzz.
